x{CS_捧魂}*N
Lose 20% MaxHP and gain +24.0 Damage Rate(Max +120.0) per second.

x{通常の矢_low_遠} to Far

x{job04.5170.2}+{job04.5170.3} on Pin Down

Job04_2.format:

x{job04.4160.2}/{job04.4160.6}/{job04.4160.4} on Air(based on height)
Execution(+50% action rate to Large):
x{job04.-1.3}+{job04.-1.5} / x{job04.4210.1}+{job04.4215.1}+{job04.4218.2} (based on distance)
x({job04.4290.1}+{job04.4295.1})/(x{job04.4230.1}+{job04.4235.2})/{渾身_地_ダウン_渾身対象}+{渾身_地_ダウン_渾身対象_2} on PinDown/Air/to Down

x{N_握_軽} on Pin Down&Cling
Hit at end of swing :x{N_軽_カス}/{N_空_軽_カス}/{N_地_軽_走_カス} on Normal/Air/Dash
x{N_溜_振り中_右} on Charge

x{渾身_空_立_渾身対象_1}+{渾身_空_立_渾身対象_2}/{job05.5230.2}+{job05.5231.2} on Air/to Large on Air
x{渾身_EM立_渾身対象_1}+{渾身_EM立_渾身対象_2} when Standing on Enemy
